name: Let's Go Fishing!
description:
You can play the web version here: https://sharemygame.com/@FarmerJaim/let-s-go-fishing

I love fishing mini-games in bigger games like Stardew Valley, Okami, and Animal Crossing and have always wanted to try making one!

Use the space bar to drop your fishing line, and when you get a bite, and use the arrow keys to reel in your fish!
